description:
In this course you will learn how to come up with an amazing YouTube and/or podcast show concept that will draw attention of your desired audience, and give you massive exposure, branding and ultimate authority and revenue.

You can use a podcast or a YouTube show to brand yourself personally, or your business.

In the course I give insights from my own experience of creating a YouTube channel with over 1,000,000 views. I also draw on from what I learned by observing other successful podcasters and YouTubers, and present that in the course as well.

I also walk you through how to set up your podcast in under one day so that you can overcome any technical challenges associated with creating a podcast.

Go ahead and get this course, and get your podcast set up quickly and without any glitches or confusion. And begin getting more exposure for your business the very same day you enroll in this course.
title: How to come up with a podcast or YouTube show concept
